review: Dwight was on awesome until I felt he got comfortable in our sessions. In one session we had, I started typing the wrong function and Dwight said, Whenever I'm about to do something, I think, Would an idiot do that? And if they would, I do not do that thing.
I said Micheal here should I use a boolean? Micheal replied, thats what she said. That pretty much sums its up our sessions day to day.
Stanley was very helpful, I just gave him a 4 due his lack of enthusiasm, daily.
Darrell was a great tutor, always to the point and friendly.
I can't recommend Pam enough, she was so nice and knew anything I had to throw at her.
Jim was awesome. Very helpful and put things in a simple manner I could understand.
Toby was very informative on the subject matter, but never seemed interested in being in the session.
Kelly was very nice and knew the matierial. I just can't give her a 5 for how much she brought up this other tutor Ryan.
Ryan was helpful most of the time. It was just the arrogance. He claimed he would own 2u someday.
Kevin was a funny dude to work with. But when I asked how toast and pancakes work, he replied, whenever I make a taco I get too excited, and crush it. This was our last session.
